parameters.text:
You are a conversation analyzer for KenDev.Co. Analyze the VAPI conversation transcript and determine what action should be taken.

Actions available:
1. SCHEDULE - if user wants to schedule a consultation/appointment
2. EMAIL - if user wants to be contacted via email  
3. FOLLOWUP - if user needs a follow-up call
4. INFO - if user just needed information
5. SUPPORT - if user needs technical support

Extract user details if mentioned (name, email, phone, preferred times).

Respond ONLY with valid JSON format:
```json
{
  "action": "SCHEDULE|EMAIL|FOLLOWUP|INFO|SUPPORT",
  "summary": "Brief summary of the conversation", 
  "userDetails": {
    "name": "extracted name or null",
    "email": "extracted email or null",
    "phone": "extracted phone or null",
    "preferredTime": "extracted preferred time or null"
  },
  "priority": "HIGH|MEDIUM|LOW",
  "nextSteps": "What should happen next"
}
```

Conversation Transcript:
{{ $json.transcript || $json.conversation || $json.body.transcript || JSON.stringify($json) }}

Call Details:
- Duration: {{ $json.duration || 'Unknown' }}
- Status: {{ $json.status || 'Unknown' }}
- Timestamp: {{ $json.timestamp || new Date().toISOString() }}

parameters.subject: {{ $('Parse Analysis').item(0).json.action === 'SCHEDULE' ? 'Consultation Scheduled - KenDev.Co' : 'Thank you for contacting KenDev.Co' }}
parameters.message:
üöÄ KenDev.Co

Full-Stack Development & AI Solutions

{{ $('Parse Analysis').item(0).json.action === 'SCHEDULE' ? 'Your Consultation is Scheduled! üìÖ' : 'Thank You for Reaching Out! üëã' }}

Hi {{ $('Parse Analysis').item(0).json.userDetails.name || 'there' }},

{{ $('Parse Analysis').item(0).json.action === 'SCHEDULE' ? '

Great news! I've received your consultation request and scheduled an initial meeting. You should receive a calendar invitation shortly.

' : '

Thank you for contacting us via our AI assistant. I've received your inquiry and will follow up with you soon.

' }}

üìù Conversation Summary

{{ $('Parse Analysis').item(0).json.summary }}

{{ $('Parse Analysis').item(0).json.nextSteps ? '

üéØ Next Steps

'+$('Parse Analysis').item(0).json.nextSteps+'

' : '' }}

I specialize in:

  • üåê Full-Stack Web Development (Next.js, React, Node.js)
  • ü§ñ AI Integration & Automation
  • ‚òÅÔ∏è Cloud Solutions & DevOps
  • üì± Mobile App Development
  • üîó API Development & Integration

Looking forward to discussing your project!

Kenneth Courtney

Full-Stack Developer & AI Specialist

üìß kenneth.courtney@gmail.com | üåê kendev.co

This email was sent in response to your VAPI AI Assistant conversation.

parameters.responseBody:
{
  "toolCallId": "{{ $('VAPI Webhook').item(0).json.toolCallId || $('VAPI Webhook').item(0).json.tool_call_id || 'conversation_processed' }}",
  "result": "{{ 
    $('Parse Analysis').item(0).json.action === 'SCHEDULE' ? 
      'Perfect! I\'ve scheduled your consultation and you\'ll receive a calendar invitation shortly. A detailed follow-up email has also been sent with next steps. Looking forward to speaking with you!' :
    $('Parse Analysis').item(0).json.action === 'EMAIL' ?
      'Thank you for your inquiry! I\'ve sent you a detailed email with information about our services. I\'ll follow up personally within 24 hours.' :
    $('Parse Analysis').item(0).json.action === 'FOLLOWUP' ?
      'I\'ve noted your request for a follow-up call. You\'ll receive an email confirmation, and I\'ll reach out to schedule a convenient time to speak.' :
    $('Parse Analysis').item(0).json.action === 'SUPPORT' ?
      'I\'ve forwarded your technical question to our support team. You should receive a detailed response via email within a few hours.' :
      'Thank you for your interest in KenDev.Co! I\'ve saved your inquiry and will follow up with relevant information via email.'
  }}"
}
